<!-- THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED, PLEASE DO NOT EDIT IT MANUALLY -->

# Clan

Clans are a permanent kind of [party](https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/tachyon/blob/master/docs/schema/party.md) with additional features.

A clan has a profil which includes several information like tag, name, description.

### Manage clan

Every user is allowed to create a clan with [clan/create](#create). Then he is the clan leader. The clan leader is the only one who is allowed to delete the clan with the request [clan/delete](#delete).

Clan leader and clan co-leaders are able to update the profile [clan/update](#update).

Clan leader and clan co-leaders are allowed to invite different players with [clan/invite](#invite). (There are no limitations of the count of members.) The invitation can be cancelled by [clan/cancelInvite](#cancelinvite). Invited players can accept invitiation by [aclan/cceptInvite](#acceptinvite) and decline by [clan/declineInvite](#declineinvite).

Only the clan-leader is able to kick members by [clan/kickMember](#kickmember). Similarly, any member can leave the clan they are currently in with [clan/leave](#leave).

The clan leader is allowed to appoint members as clan co-leader with [clan/setRole](#setrole). The clan leader has also the possibility to transfer his leadership role to a different member with the same command. (ATTENTION: By executing this command the clan leader loses his permissions!)

### Special use cases

If the clan-leader leaves the clan by clan/leave the oldest co-leader is set as new clan leader. If no co-leader exist the oldest member is set as new clan leader.

If the clan-leader leaves the clan and he is the last member the clan will be removed.
---
- [accept](#accept)
- [cancel](#cancel)
- [create](#create)
- [decline](#decline)
- [delete](#delete)
- [deleted](#deleted)
- [invite](#invite)
- [invited](#invited)
- [kick](#kick)
- [kicked](#kicked)
- [leave](#leave)
- [roleChanged](#rolechanged)
- [setRole](#setrole)
- [update](#update)
- [updated](#updated)
- [view](#view)
- [viewList](#viewlist)
---

## Accept

Accept an invite to a clan.

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanAcceptRequest",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "user",
        "target": "server",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/accept" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanAcceptRequestData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": { "clanId": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clanId" } },
            "required": ["clanId"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "request",
    "messageId": "eiusmod quis nostrud laborum est",
    "commandId": "clan/accept",
    "data": {
        "clanId": "12345"
    }
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type ClanId = string;

export interface ClanAcceptRequest {
    type: "request";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/accept";
    data: ClanAcceptRequestData;
}
export interface ClanAcceptRequestData {
    clanId: ClanId;
}
```
### Response

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanAcceptResponse",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "anyOf": [
        {
            "title": "ClanAcceptOkResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/accept" },
                "status": { "const": "success" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status"]
        },
        {
            "title": "ClanAcceptFailResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/accept" },
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "response",
    "messageId": "enim mollit",
    "commandId": "clan/accept",
    "status": "success"
}
```


- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

```json
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },

            "title": "ClanCancelRequestData",

            "required": ["userId"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

```json
    "type": "request",
    "messageId": "Excepteur dolore mollit dolore",
```

```json
            "name": "nisi qui",
            "tag": "inci"
        }
    }
```

## Delete

Delete your clan.

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanDeleteRequest",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "user",
        "target": "server",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/delete" }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId"]
}

```
</details>

```json
    "commandId": "clan/delete"
```

## Deleted

A clan was deleted. Sent to all clan members.

- Endpoint Type: **Event**
- Source: **Server**
- Target: **User**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Event

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanDeletedEvent",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "event" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/deleted" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanDeletedEventData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": { "clanId": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clanId" } },
            "required": ["clanId"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "event",
    "messageId": "adipisicing eiusmod",
    "commandId": "clan/deleted",
    "data": {
        "clanId": "12345"
    }
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type ClanId = string;

    type: "event";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/deleted";
    data: ClanDeletedEventData;
}

    clanId: ClanId;
}
```

## Invite

Invite the target player to your clan.

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanInviteRequest",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "user",
        "target": "server",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/invite" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanInviteRequestData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": { "userId": { "$ref": "#/definitions/userId" } },
            "required": ["userId"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "request",
    "messageId": "in dolore nulla Lorem",
    "commandId": "clan/invite",

        "userId": "351"
    }
}
```
</details>

```ts
    type: "request";
    messageId: string;

}
```

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json

    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "anyOf": [
        {
            "title": "ClanInviteOkResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/invite" },
                "status": { "const": "success" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status"]
        },
        {
            "title": "ClanInviteFailResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/invite" },
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json

    "type": "response",
    "messageId": "qui",

    "status": "success"
```

## Invited

A player has been invited to a clan. Sent to the invited player.

- Endpoint Type: **Event**
- Source: **Server**
- Target: **User**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Event

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanInvitedEvent",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "event" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/invited" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanInvitedEventData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "clanUpdateableBaseData": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/clanUpdateableBaseData"
                }
            },
            "required": ["clanUpdateableBaseData"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "event",
    "messageId": "minim Excepteur Duis",
    "commandId": "clan/invited",
    "data": {
        "clanUpdateableBaseData": {
            "name": "adipisicing",
            "tag": "Except"
        }
    }
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export interface ClanInvitedEvent {
    type: "event";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/invited";
    data: ClanInvitedEventData;
}
export interface ClanInvitedEventData {
    clanUpdateableBaseData: ClanUpdateableBaseData;
}
export interface ClanUpdateableBaseData {
    name: string;
    tag: string;
}
```
---

## Kick

Kick a member from your clan.

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanKickRequest",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "user",
        "target": "server",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/kick" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanKickRequestData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": { "userId": { "$ref": "#/definitions/userId" } },
            "required": ["userId"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "request",
    "messageId": "in laborum amet consequat elit",
    "commandId": "clan/kick",
    "data": {
        "userId": "351"
    }
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type UserId = string;

export interface ClanKickRequest {
    type: "request";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/kick";
    data: ClanKickRequestData;
}
export interface ClanKickRequestData {
    userId: UserId;
}
```
### Response

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanKickResponse",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "anyOf": [
        {
            "title": "ClanKickOkResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/kick" },
                "status": { "const": "success" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status"]
        },
        {
            "title": "ClanKickFailResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/kick" },
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "response",
    "messageId": "veniam laboris minim",
    "commandId": "clan/kick",
    "status": "success"
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export interface ClanKickOkResponse {
    type: "response";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/kick";
    status: "success";
}
```
Possible Failed Reasons: `internal_error`, `unauthorized`, `invalid_request`, `command_unimplemented`

---

- Target: **User**

```json
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "event" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/kicked" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanKickedEventData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": { "clanId": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clanId" } },
            "required": ["clanId"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "event",
    "messageId": "exercitation nostrud",
    "commandId": "clan/kicked",

        "clanId": "12345"
    }
```

```json
        {
            "title": "ClanLeaveOkResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/leave" },
                "status": { "const": "success" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status"]
        },

            "title": "ClanLeaveFailResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/leave" },
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

```json
    "messageId": "magna",
    "commandId": "clan/leave",
    "status": "success"
}
```

## RoleChanged

A clan member's role was changed. Sent to affected clan member.

- Endpoint Type: **Event**
- Source: **Server**
- Target: **User**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Event

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanRoleChangedEvent",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "event" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/roleChanged" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanRoleChangedEventData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "userId": { "$ref": "#/definitions/userId" },
                "clanId": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clanId" },
                "newRole": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clanRole" }
            },
            "required": ["userId", "clanId", "newRole"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "event",
    "messageId": "dolor ullamco sit eiusmod ex",
    "commandId": "clan/roleChanged",
    "data": {
        "userId": "351",
        "clanId": "12345",
        "newRole": "leader"
    }
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type UserId = string;
export type ClanId = string;
export type ClanRole = "member" | "coLeader" | "leader";

export interface ClanRoleChangedEvent {
    type: "event";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/roleChanged";
    data: ClanRoleChangedEventData;
}
export interface ClanRoleChangedEventData {
    userId: UserId;
    clanId: ClanId;
    newRole: ClanRole;
}
```

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanSetRoleRequest",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "user",
        "target": "server",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/setRole" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanSetRoleRequestData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "userId": { "$ref": "#/definitions/userId" },
                "clanId": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clanId" },
                "targetRole": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clanRole" }
            },
            "required": ["userId", "clanId", "targetRole"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<summary>Example</summary>

```json
    "type": "request",
    "messageId": "culpa nostrud occaecat in",
    "commandId": "clan/setRole",

        "clanId": "12345",

    }
```

```ts
    type: "request";

    commandId: "clan/setRole";
    data: ClanSetRoleRequestData;
}

    userId: UserId;
    clanId: ClanId;
    targetRole: ClanRole;
}
```
### Response

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanSetRoleResponse",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "anyOf": [
        {
            "title": "ClanSetRoleOkResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/setRole" },
                "status": { "const": "success" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status"]
        },
        {
            "title": "ClanSetRoleFailResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/setRole" },
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "response",
    "messageId": "labore",
    "commandId": "clan/setRole",
    "status": "success"
}
```

```ts
    type: "response";
```

## Update

Update your clan.

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanUpdateRequest",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "user",
        "target": "server",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/update" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanUpdateRequestData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "clanUpdateableData": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/clanUpdateableData"
                }
            },
            "required": ["clanUpdateableData"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "request",
    "messageId": "proident incididunt",
    "commandId": "clan/update",
    "data": {
        "clanUpdateableData": {
            "name": "sunt et voluptate nisi iru",
            "tag": "in v",
            "description": "minim aute qui mollit"
        }
    }
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type ClanUpdateableData = ClanUpdateableBaseData & {
    description?: string;
};

export interface ClanUpdateRequest {
    type: "request";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/update";
    data: ClanUpdateRequestData;
}
export interface ClanUpdateRequestData {
    clanUpdateableData: ClanUpdateableData;
}
export interface ClanUpdateableBaseData {
    name: string;
    tag: string;
}
```
### Response

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanUpdateResponse",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "anyOf": [
        {
            "title": "ClanUpdateOkResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/update" },
                "status": { "const": "success" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status"]
        },
        {
            "title": "ClanUpdateFailResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/update" },
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "response",
    "messageId": "eiusmod mollit aute minim",
    "commandId": "clan/update",
    "status": "success"
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export interface ClanUpdateOkResponse {
    type: "response";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/update";
    status: "success";
}
```
Possible Failed Reasons: `internal_error`, `unauthorized`, `invalid_request`, `command_unimplemented`

## Updated

One ore more clan properties were updated. Sent to all clan members.

- Endpoint Type: **Event**
- Source: **Server**
- Target: **User**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Event

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanUpdatedEvent",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "event" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/updated" },
        "data": {
            "$ref": "#/definitions/clanUpdateableData",
            "title": "ClanUpdatedEventData"
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "event",
    "messageId": "qui",
    "commandId": "clan/updated",
    "data": {
        "name": "pariatur ",
        "tag": "vel",
        "description": "tempor ex proident"
    }
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type ClanUpdatedEventData = ClanUpdateableBaseData & {
    description?: string;
};

export interface ClanUpdatedEvent {
    type: "event";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/updated";
    data: ClanUpdatedEventData;
}
export interface ClanUpdateableBaseData {
    name: string;
    tag: string;
}
```

## View

Get detailed information about a clan.

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanViewRequest",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "user",
        "target": "server",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/view" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanViewRequestData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": { "clanId": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clanId" } },
            "required": ["clanId"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "request",
    "messageId": "nostrud mollit ex Excepteur",
    "commandId": "clan/view",
    "data": {
        "clanId": "12345"
    }
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type ClanId = string;

export interface ClanViewRequest {
    type: "request";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/view";
    data: ClanViewRequestData;
}
export interface ClanViewRequestData {
    clanId: ClanId;
}
```
### Response

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanViewResponse",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "anyOf": [
        {
            "title": "ClanViewOkResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/view" },
                "status": { "const": "success" },
                "data": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/clan",
                    "title": "ClanViewOkResponseData"
                }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "data"]
        },
        {
            "title": "ClanViewFailResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/view" },
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "response",
    "messageId": "nisi est dolore sit",
    "commandId": "clan/view",
    "status": "success",
    "data": "12345"
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type ClanViewOkResponseData = ClanId &
    ClanUpdateableData & {
        membersCount: number;
        members: ClanMember[];
    };
export type ClanId = string;
export type ClanUpdateableData = ClanUpdateableBaseData & {
    description?: string;
};
export type UserId = string;
export type ClanRole = "member" | "coLeader" | "leader";

export interface ClanViewOkResponse {
    type: "response";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/view";
    status: "success";
    data: ClanViewOkResponseData;
}
export interface ClanUpdateableBaseData {
    name: string;
    tag: string;
}
export interface ClanMember {
    userId: UserId;
    role: ClanRole;
    joinDate: string;
}
```
Possible Failed Reasons: `internal_error`, `unauthorized`, `invalid_request`, `command_unimplemented`

---

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**

```json
        "source": "user",
        "target": "server",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/viewList" }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId"]
}

```

```json
    "type": "request",
    "messageId": "voluptate minim aute",
    "commandId": "clan/viewList"

```

```ts
    type: "request";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/viewList";
}
```
### Response

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanViewListResponse",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "anyOf": [
        {
            "title": "ClanViewListOkResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/viewList" },
                "status": { "const": "success" },
                "data": {
                    "title": "ClanViewListOkResponseData",
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                        "clanList": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "items": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "properties": {
                                    "clanId": {
                                        "$ref": "#/definitions/clanId"
                                    },
                                    "clanUpdateableBaseData": {
                                        "$ref": "#/definitions/clanUpdateableBaseData"
                                    }
                                },
                                "required": ["clanId", "clanUpdateableBaseData"]
                            }
                        }
                    },
                    "required": ["clanList"]
                }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "data"]
        },
        {
            "title": "ClanViewListFailResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/viewList" },
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "response",
    "messageId": "qui proident eiusmod aliqua",
    "commandId": "clan/viewList",
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
        "clanList": [
            {
                "clanId": "12345",
                "clanUpdateableBaseData": {
                    "name": "pariatur nost",
                    "tag": "ame"
                }
            },
            {
                "clanId": "12345",
                "clanUpdateableBaseData": {
                    "name": "ex",
                    "tag": "et v"
                }
            },
            {
                "clanId": "12345",
                "clanUpdateableBaseData": {
                    "name": "nulla id",
                    "tag": "magna "
                }
            },
            {
                "clanId": "12345",
                "clanUpdateableBaseData": {
                    "name": "eiusmod voluptat",
                    "tag": "dolor "
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type ClanId = string;

export interface ClanViewListOkResponse {
    type: "response";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/viewList";
    status: "success";
    data: ClanViewListOkResponseData;
}
export interface ClanViewListOkResponseData {
    clanList: {
        clanId: ClanId;
        clanUpdateableBaseData: ClanUpdateableBaseData;
    }[];
}
export interface ClanUpdateableBaseData {
    name: string;
    tag: string;
}
```
Possible Failed Reasons: `internal_error`, `unauthorized`, `invalid_request`, `command_unimplemented`
